text: "The fact that we have been able to show this much energy savings in such a short time bodes well for our overall climate goals," says Mayor Hancock of the news from the 2018 Energize Denver Annual Report, releasing TOMORROW! @MayorHancock @CityofDenverpic.twitter.com/eF2avgh13Q

text: Hey Daniel, we’ve been told by DDPHE that a quarantine is when a person who isn’t sick but has been around people who are is kept away from the general public for a period of time. Isolation is when they’ve exhibited symptoms and are being kept away from the general public.
text_html: Hey Daniel, we’ve been told by DDPHE that a quarantine is when a person who isn’t sick but has been around people who are is kept away from the general public for a period of time. Isolation is when they’ve exhibited symptoms and are being kept away from the general public.
